name: Maha Vailo - Weaponmaster
text:
2 Spellcaster Monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: equip any number of Equip Spells from your Deck to this card. This card gains 500 ATK for each Equip Spell card equipped to this card. You can send 1 Equip Card equipped to this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Maha Vailo" from your Deck, hand, or GY.
